name: Story Time with Grampum Peepmpop 2: Revenge of Puppem Gramma
name_original: Story Time with Grampum Peepmpop 2: Revenge of Puppem Gramma
description:
Everyone the world over remembers Story Time with Grampum Peepmpop, because it sometimes said "penis" or "fuck" and that was pretty good. The story now continues with developments in character, narrative techniques, other words like "penis" and "fuck" that weren't in there before, and so much god damn art and music I should sue myself for not paying myself for this.

I love you.

Story

This game takes place in the now-connected universe of All the Games I've Made Apparently. Play as Puppem Gramma, waking up in a strange place, attempting to make it back home to her dear, loving Peepmpop.

Controls
  • WASD and Mouse to move/look
  • Left Mouse Button to interact with things
  • Left Shift to sprint
  • Everything else is contextual
Features
  • Twice as many words in all categories compared to STwGP
  • Music for every level, written in Famitracker, many of which are transcriptions of songs from the other games but also some new tunes too.
  • References galore to games no-one else will remember
  • Something like 60 new and unique levels, I didn't count, I'm not going to bother counting levels, come on.
  • Loot boxes and customizable Pachinks™
  • Two endings with cutscenes and also an intro cutscene
Credits

Everything made by Giggs, using Famitracker (N163), Photoshop, and Game Maker: Studio. The typeface used is Ænigma Fonts' Edit Undo Font Family, which is free for commercial use or otherwise.
